content: you will have a 17 5 circumference let s say you decide on 6 repeats now multiply your number of repeats by 15 which is how many stitches is in one repeat of the growing leaves pattern 6 × 15 = 90 for our example you would cast on 90 sts if you come up with a different number cast on that amount just make sure your number of stitches to cast on is evenly divisible by 15 follow instructions for worsted version but only complete 3 repeats of the growing leaves pattern 51 row completed decrease row row 52 p1 k10 k2tog k1 p1 repeat to end sm row 53 p1 k9 k2tog k1 p1 repeat to end sm top border row 54 p1 p9 k2 p1 repeat to end sm repeat row 54 for two more rounds bind off in pattern gently block as described on previous page support and community find me on ravelry http //www ravelry com/designers/meghan-macko join my ravelry group for pattern support and more at http //www ravelry com/groups/meghan-macko-designs follow me on instagram @meghanmacko ©2009 2017 meghan macko all rights reserved in purchasing this pattern you agree to print and use this pattern only for your personal non-commercial use you may not distribute or sell electronic or paper copies of this pattern growing leaves cowl by meghan macko 5
